items.title: Find a diet you love
items.desc: Find a nutritious Diet that fits your lifestyle and food preferences. Take charge of your daily habits with one of the many ongoing Diets including Clean Eating and High Protein

items.title: Start a simplified meal plan
items.desc: Follow a 7-21 day Meal Plan and get four pre-planned recipes a day. Depending on your health goals, there are many Meal Plans to choose from including Keto Burn and Vegan for a week.

items.title: Track your way to success
items.desc: Track your activities and what you eat with the help of our food-, exercise- and water trackers to maintain a balanced everyday life.

items.title: Start your own healthy journey
items.desc: To help you reach your goals and customize your health journey you can add your favorite meals, food items, recipes and exercises to your Favorites.

slogan.title: That makes us different:
slogan.desc: What sets us apart is our ability to combine data science with a passion for food. Our platform uses machine learning artificial intelligence algorithms and big data coding to analyze historical data and accurately anticipate trends. In addition, we focus on offering a joint alternative for the eating habits of both people and pets, which differentiates us from other solutions on the market.

section-eight.desc: With the recipes created (and put to the test) by our in-house team of professional chefs and nutritionists, we can promise you that healthy eating is delicious!

reviews.title: 10 kgs in 6 weeks
reviews.desc: I am impressed with the results I have achieved with Fooddect. Thanks to their platform, I have been able to better understand my eating habits and I have lost 12 kilos in the last six months. I feel healthier and more energetic than ever!

reviews.title: 40 kgs in 8 weeks
reviews.desc: Fooddect has been an incredible tool in my weight loss journey. With its help, I have been able to make more informed decisions about my diet and have lost 20 pounds in just three months. I am very happy with the results!

reviews.title: 42 kgs in 9 weeks
reviews.desc: I am so grateful to Fooddect for helping me reach my weight goal. Their platform has provided me with valuable insights into nutrition and eating habits, and in just four months, I have lost 25 pounds. I feel fantastic!

reviews.title: 33 kgs in 7 weeks
reviews.desc: Fooddect has changed my life. Thanks to its innovative approach to weight loss, I have managed to lose 18 kilos in six months. I am impressed with the results and feel healthier and fitter than ever before.

title.left: Feeding the future, anticipating your desires.

one.subtitle: Why trust us:
one.desc: You can trust us because we are committed to excellence, integrity and innovation. Our platform has been developed by a team of experts in artificial intelligence and food, guaranteeing the highest quality and precision in our services. Additionally, we are trusted by a wide range of users, including food industry companies, conscious consumers and nutrition experts.

two.subtitle: Who has trusted us:
two.desc: Our clients include food and beverage companies, supermarkets, veterinarians, nutritionists, and pet and food lovers who value accuracy and innovation in food trend analysis.

section-thirteen.subtitle: At Fooddect, we are at the forefront of the food revolution. We specialize in creating AI-powered solutions that anticipate trends and detect changes in the eating habits of consumers, both human and furry.
list-p: Imagine having the ability to predict which foods will be the next favorites on the market, understand how people's tastes are evolving, and anticipate emerging dietary needs. That's exactly what we do at FoodVisionInsights.

Our mission is to provide an innovative platform that is not only one step ahead of food trends, but also offers a comprehensive view of eating habits for both people and pets. We strive to create a comprehensive alternative that covers all aspects of food consumption.

To achieve this, we combine the power of machine learning artificial intelligence algorithms and big data coding. We analyze historical data from our platform and merge it with other internal and external sources to obtain a complete and accurate view of the food landscape.
At Fooddect, we don't just anticipate the future of food, we create it. Join us on this journey towards a smarter, more conscious and more delicious food industry than ever before.

projects.title: AI TO ANTICIPATE TRENDS AND DETECT CHANGES IN CONSUMERS' EATING HABITS (Platform for People's and Pets' Eating Habits)
projects.desc: Our AI anticipates trends and detects changes in the eating habits of consumers and pets, offering a unique platform to understand the market in an agile and precise way.
